sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANDING Isles, Pulo Sanding , or Sandiang, two small islands, which are both inhabited, and are situated off the south-west coast of Sumatra, near the south-eastern extremity of the Nassau or Poggy Isles, in which group they are sometimes included. They produce the wild nutmeg and some good timber.
